item.title: Setting up this Website
item.description: Installing Hugo This website runs on the static site generator Hugo with the theme Typo by Francesco Tomaselli. To install Hugo, on windows, you can open the Windows Terminal and run winget install Hugo.Hugo.Extended. Instructions for other operating systems can be found here. Installing Git In order to run Hugo, we also need to have git installed. This doesn’t require a terminal and can be downloaded here Create a new site Relaunch the terminal you used to install hugo and cd to the directory where you’d like to have your site.
